scripts.setup-https: powershell -Command "if (!(Get-Command choco -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Write-Host 'Chocolatey not found. Install it from https://chocolatey.org/install and run this command again.'; exit 1 }; if (!(Get-Command mkcert -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { choco install mkcert -y }; mkcert -install; mkcert localhost 127.0.0.1 ::1; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path certs; Move-Item -Force localhost+2.pem certs/localhost.pem; Move-Item -Force localhost+2-key.pem certs/localhost-key.pem; Write-Host 'HTTPS certs generated and moved to ./certs. Restart dev server with npm run dev.'"
